name: Habarshi
description: Habarshi is a messenger for full-fledged correspondence between students, teachers and parents; receipt and control of homework, control of children's safety in correspondence and geolocation with an alarm button SOS.

SDGs.evidenceText: Habarshi is a messenger for full-fledged correspondence between students, teachers and parents; receipt and control of homework, control of children's safety in correspondence and geolocation with an alarm button SOS.
I shared this product in the public domain for other programmers, so they can use it in their organizations and jointly develop this product
An anonymous call center where any child can safely report violations of his or her rights, harassment by others, and infringement of gender equality
